name: EscapeParadise
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: escape paradise
des:
Escape paradise is tropical maze game that tests your strategy and decision making skills.

You are strained on an island and need to make your way out. There are different paths you can take and keep in mind that sometimes the same decision at different points in time can lead to a different outcome.

There are many ways you can get out, but even more ways to get stuck. 

To advance through the game you need to select between the options given by Alexa

Let's see if you've got what it takes to escape the island! Good luck!

Your feedback is very important for us. For any queries, observations or suggestions please contact us at contactus@msimconsulting.com
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
